story: The Emberfall Kingdom of Lumina once a beacon of prosperity and light, now faces a dire fate. The malevolent Void Spectral Warrior, Ethariel the Banished, has awoken from his slumber seeking to plunge the realm into eternal darkness. Accompanied by his treacherous allies - the Ethereal Lightshifter, Aerandil the Illuminated, and the enigmatic Realm Unraveler, Zeranix, the Dark Conclave seems unstoppable in their sinister quest to engulf the world in shadows. The fate of Lumina now rests upon a brave hero who dares to stand against the encroaching darkness.
greetingGameMessage: Welcome, brave traveler, to the Emberfall Kingdom of Lumina. Beware the looming shadows that now threaten to consume all light. Your courage and strength will be tested in the face of darkness. May the illumination of hope guide your path.
defeatEndingMessage: With great sorrow, the once radiant Emberfall Kingdom of Lumina falls into the grips of eternal night. The malevolent Ethariel the Banished, along with the Dark Conclave, now rule without mercy, bringing despair and shadow upon all who dwell there. A grim fate indeed.
gameOverMessage: Alas, the darkness prevails as the brave champion falls to the sinister forces of Ethariel and his allies. The Emberfall Kingdom of Lumina plunges into an abyss of eternal night, a realm consumed by shadows and devoid of hope.
